Module kivakit.core
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.thread.locks

Class ReadWriteLock

java.lang.Object
java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantReadWriteLock
com.telenav.kivakit.core.thread.locks.ReadWriteLock
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, ReadWriteLock
public class ReadWriteLock extends ReentrantReadWriteLock
A lock subclass that adds convenient features to ReentrantLock.
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
